title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
author: Chef John
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Reserve 1 cup of pasta water and drain the rest.
In a large skillet, cook the pancetta over medium heat until crispy. Add the minced garlic and cook for another minute.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and grated Parmesan cheese.
Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet with the pancetta. Remove from heat and quickly toss to combine.
Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the spaghetti, tossing continuously to create a creamy sauce. Add reserved pasta water as needed to reach desired consistency.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Stir Fry
author: Chef Amy
steps: Marinate chicken in soy sauce for 15 minutes.
Heat oil in a wok over high heat. Add ginger and stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add chicken and cook until browned, about 5 minutes.
Toss in bell pepper and broccoli, stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender.
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot.

title: Chocolate Cake
author: Baker Sue
steps: Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease a 9-inch cake pan.
Mix flour, cocoa, sugar, and baking soda in a bowl.
Add eggs, milk, oil, and vanilla. Beat until smooth.
Pour batter into the pan and bake for 30-35 minutes.
